TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EmphasisWord extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates the values of for a specific .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The word emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render emphasis; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
Both <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero, and the values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance. From more information, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>,and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates an engine-specific default level of emphasis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord Moderate = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord None = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord Reduced = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord Strong = int32(1)
